titleStmt.title: Animadversions vpon those notes which the late observator hath published upon the seven doctrines and positions which the King by way of recapitulation (hee saith) layes open so offensive
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
An answer to Henry Parker's Observation upon some of His Majesties late answers and expresses.
